00062 struct cfs_lstr {
00063         char            *ls_str;
00064         int             ls_len;
00065 };
00066 
00067 /*
00068  * Structure to represent <range_expr> token of the syntax.
00069  */
00070 struct cfs_range_expr {
00071         /*
00072          * Link to cfs_expr_list::el_exprs.
00073          */
00074         struct list_head        re_link;
00075         __u32                   re_lo;
00076         __u32                   re_hi;
00077         __u32                   re_stride;
00078 };
00079 
00080 struct cfs_expr_list {
00081         struct list_head        el_link;
00082         struct list_head        el_exprs;
00083 };
00084
